title: Mortgages of Real Property or Fixtures
context: CHAPTER 506 MORTGAGES OF REAL PROPERTY OR FIXTURES Section 506-1 Lien of mortgages of real property or fixtures; debts secured; priority 506-2 On what property; enforceability 506-3 After-acquired real property and fixtures 506-4 Interests in recorded mortgages and leases 506-5 Use and possession of mortgaged property 506-6 Registered land 506-7 Mortgages on real property, damage or destruction of collateral 506-8 Release of mortgages of real property or fixtures 506-9 Mortgage insurance; notice of right to cancel 506-10 Reverse mortgage loan Cross References Civil relief for state military forces, see chapter 657D. Mortgage rescue fraud prevention act, see chapter 480E. Secure and fair enforcement for mortgage licensing act, see chapter 454F.
